verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, after \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron, \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w drew|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*;
